content.detailedDescription: Are family were all up north at our cabin on spirit lake. after being there for a day, i wanted to go into aitkin to see a movie that evening,i left the cabin just as the sun was setting,i only drove about one half mile from cabin on cty road 28 going west to hwy 169,i was halfway up a small hill and the car just stopped in the middle of the road, i remember trying to start the car and nothing happened. i just happened to look out my window on drivers side ,suddenly this bright red glowing  disc about four feet thick and about fifteen feet across  came right over the trees from the south,passed right over the car from left to right over the trees on the other side of the road heading north towards aitkin. it made no noise  and it was just above the trees moving very slow but steady, it only lasted about 30 seconds or less. i did not know what to do, it took a couple of minutes and i was able to start car again,i quickly turned the car around and went back to tell my parents, they laughed at me and did not beleive me,i was mad that they did not beleive me,very mad.        as soon as it came over the trees i knew what it was,nothing from this earth. crazy i know but true . i would take a lie detector test !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!                thanks for listening i will never forget what i saw.
content.summary: i was going to town  to see movie,   car stopped on road  ufo passed over car .

content.detailedDescription:
A star like light dropped straight down then blacked out before landing in a ravine.  i was driving on the highway and saw this from a distance.

i know it wasn't a shooting star or meteor because of the straight path down and the control of its light that suddenly shut off.

i was happy to have seen it.

i have multiple reports to file so ill try and get them in here.
content.summary: A light dropped straight down then dissappeared before landing.

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out in the yard and saw a triangular object moving very slowly to the northwest over my neighbor's yard.  i was looking at mostly the underside of it and there were 3 white lights and 1 red light on the underside.  the lights were what drew my attention to it. it was moving too slowly to be a plane, was only about 25 feet above the ground and i did not notice any noise.  it was not particularly large, but i can't estimate the size.  i thought of the stealth bomber, since it was triangular, but it wasn't big enough and was so close to the ground that i couldn't believe that was what it was.  i was quite frightened by it and made my dog come back in the house, closed the door and walked away from the door.
content.summary: 25 feet from ground

content.detailedDescription: Laying looking at sky and saw what looked like all descriptions above moving in a bycicle chain or tank wheel way
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Cross,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: Laying looking at sky and saw what looked like all descriptions above moving in a bycicle chain or tank wheel way.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette on our upstairs deck.  i was looking up at the sky like i usually do when i go outside and noticed something different about what i thought was a star at first then thought it must be a plane.  it seemed to change shape like splitting into two objects but they looked connected.  as i was watching i thought it must be a plane coming into the local airport - we live close by, but it didn't move along a path.  i thought if its a plane it will pass over the treeline close to the house, but it didn't then i thought it was strange.  it had colours that are a little hard to explain but i think they were kind of green / blue and white and i thought i saw red at times.  as i looked at it i thought it became a triangle because i could follow an outline of what looked like lights along the sides then the shape shifted and i thought it was going away, then it looked like it came back again and i saw the outline again.  i thought 'oh it must be a ufo' and i kept staring at it, and i began to have an image in my mind of a blue line going out towards it and i was not scared or anything. it faded in and out and at one point completely disappeared, then came back and then disappeared again.  at that time i put out my cigarette and came in to my husband and told him i thought i had seen a ufo.  i then went to my computer to check my email and then our tv which was on began to buzz and the sound from it became distorted then went normal - my husband and i looked at each other and then the disotortion happened again.  i told my husband that i thought i should call the police and report it, but decided not to in case they thought i was a crazy person.  the whole event was over within about 10 minutes including the tv event.
content.summary: Saw weird object in sky seemed to pulse change shape and colours saw outline went in and out and then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: Looked out kitchen window.  i saw a star twinkling in the north west sky about 40 degrees above the horizon.  i thought it was odd to be twinkling so brightly and quickly.  after continuing to look at it, i noticed colors: red, green, blue and white.  i grabbed some small binoculars and looked again, same result.  i asked my wife to look: she saw the same thing. the object never moved.
content.summary: Star-like object emitting red, green and blue light

content.detailedDescription: I just walked out the door to do some work in my yard and a buddy of mmine noticed something in the sky so i grabed my minoculars from my truck.  when i focused on i saw this object spinning and lots of bright lights shining.  it looked alove.  i handed him the minoculars and ran in the house to get my camcorder.  i couldnt believe what i was recording almost like a dream.  i noticed after several minutes i didnt hear or see any planes leaving or going to the airport for at least 10-15 mins then i lost sight.  the next day i woke up with bleeding in my mouth and nose.  never happened before.  anyways i havent had much sleep after seeing this object so i will leave it at that.  this can be viewed at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Shape shifting ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday, sunday,i had just completed a 2 day kite festival in ft walton beach, florida. we were staying at the 4 points sheridan hotel right on the beach. i was supposed to meet some new friends i met at the fest around 9 pm to night fly with me. at approx. 8:50 pm, i went out to the beach to fly one of my two line stunt kites with about 6 flashing different colored led lights attatched.(i had done this same exact thing friday night-april 1st from 8:30pm till midnight and saw nothing) people tell me all the time my kite looks like a ufo when flown at night with lights. ok, so, i'm flying my kite on the beach, not really a whole lot of people were out on the beach at the time. i had my kite in the air,lights flashing, ipod on, and was just flying and tricking my kite. it was a totally clear night, millions of stars, it was beautiful and peacefull. a small group of people walked past me looking at the colorful night display i was putting on. when they were about 100 ft. in front of me ( i know this because my kite lines are 85') i noticed movement in the sky out the right corner of my eye. first initial thought was a falling star. when i fully looked in the direction of the movement, i froze, what i saw defied explanation. 4 lights in a triangle pattern, 1 in front, 3 a distance behind it, all in a row moving south over the gulf coming from land.       .
.           .
            .
    
they blended in perfectly with the stars above, same brightness, size, intensity, everything. you could see stars through it. i immediately let go of my kite handles, ripped off my ipod and screamed at the group of people ahead of me and asked if they see that? what, they asked? a ufo i replied. they must have thought i was joking, because they just ignored me and kept walking. when i looked back up in the sky, i saw the lights had stopped. they were still there, but stopped moving. i stood there not moving and observed the lights for about 20 minutes, too shaken up to do anything else. about that time, my new acquantiances showed up, and i relayed the story, omitting the fact that what i saw was still there. we continued flying for another 20 or so minutes and every 5 or 10 seconds, i would gaze up and it was still there. my wife shows up about this time and i tell her the same story omitting the fact it was still there. i didn't tell them it was still there because i didn't want to sound too foolish, and the fact that i wasn't sure what i had seen, and what i kept looking at was in fact still there even thought it looked exactly like stars.  finally, i couldn't take it anymore and pulled my wife aside intent on showing her the lights. much to my surprise, they were gone!!! my wife says to me, oh yeah, i saw them too ( while they were stationary ) and thought it was the little dipper. but she too noticed that it wasn't there anymore!! this was way too large to be a airplane,totally silent, but the massiveness of size was what really freaked me out. what did i see? anyone ever see anything similar?
content.summary: 4 lights in a triangle pattern, 3 in the back in a row, 1 up front

content.detailedDescription:
I submitted a portion of this video in march.  i have decided to release the full version, except for audio.  i have lots of similar video of this activity.  the fist portion was shot in near infra red, then regular shot, and that near infrared again.  the final shot was takin with a different camera(sony108) with a better zoom as the object is flying away.  it was traveling very slow as you can tell by thelength of ther video. this is really typical activity.  nothing special.  i have seen these thousands of times.  these watchers are morphing into planes and are hidden in plane sight from an unsuspecting public.  it is really sad to know that peoiple are so unaware of the deception, and so little truth is made available to them.  this video was shot on digital 8 tape, which is not able to be edited.  it is real.  it is common in mankato.  i could go out tonight and get another similar video.  that is how common it is.  it is obvious that the truth is being hidden.  it is also obvious the public really doesnt care anyway, so why tell them? right?


*link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.
content.summary: (sg) *link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.

content.detailedDescription:
I am at work, every day i go on youtube to check for ufo videos
today there was a new post, it is a video of an erupting volcano in sakurajima, in the video there are some objects moving and flashing etc
the video sourse is the panoramic camaras at the site by the volcano.
the person that posted the video on u tube found it by googlelin it, but no one had noticed that at some point on the video there can be seen something flying in front of the screen, at first i thought that it was an insect or something of that sort, but i started pausing the video on my iphone and there it was, undeniably an ufo, it seems to be leaving a trail of smoke, i moves in a fraction of a second and it is grey in color and looks like a spaceship.
i think this video is worth looking into, when i get home tonight i'll try to rip the video frame by frame to catch the object in more detail, but am afraid that i won't have the right tools to do so.
i'll enclose if possi le the link for the video and the details for you or someone to analyze .
*(youtube information moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
the ufo shows a fraction of a second before minute -104 as seen with my iphone .
the video is from the archives of that town a think and i know fake from real, and i find hard to believe that someone could fake this particular video, specially when this ufo was not noticed and pointed out before.
i know that you investigate recent events, that's wy i contacted you, please look into it if you can, it is definatelly worth it.
content.summary: You tube video no one caught before

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter & i went outside of a cabin in a clearing at myrtle beach state park approx. 9 pm on saturday 4/2/11 where i was pointing out to her the big dipper & north star.  a fast-moving white object, the same size and light intensity of a distant star in a faint irregular cloud that was much larger than the star and was a little lighter than the dark background sky, caught my eye as it moved from west-north-west to approx. east.  the point of light was too small to make out any shape, and the light intensity did not change (i.E., did not pulsate or flash). speed and direction were constant.  i watched it for 4-5 seconds before it disappeared behind trees. i heard no noise from the object.  it seemed very distant (many miles to light years) and one could have very easily missed it.  the arc it took across the sky in which i watched this was about 90 degrees, as i recall, before it disappeared behind trees.  it was perhaps 70-75 degrees above the horizon to the northwest when i first noticed it.  the cloud did not extend from the rear of the light, but was irregular and generally oblong, with most but not all of the cloud being behind the point of light; some of it may have been in front of the light.

i've seen meteor showers and many meteors. i've seen a couple of satellites. relative to the meteors and satellites that i've seen, this was way too slow for a meteor yet way too fast for satellites, and was surrounded by the odd cloud. i was so surprised and it was so fast that i was speechless and couldn't even tell my daughter to look (not that she would have spotted it anyway in that time).  i was trying to figure out what this could be. after the sighting, we walked down to the beach and looked up again and saw a small flock of large light-colored birds flying very high parallel to the beach--migrating north, i assumed--i ruled out a flock of birds, for the "ufo" that i saw earlier had a point of light in it, it was much faster and distant, and its cloud seemed to have a uniform density.

weather conditions at the time were cool (50's), clear sky, and calm.
content.summary: Faint solid light surrounded by faint  "cloud" passed across approx 90 degrees arc of sky w to e in seconds without sound, very high

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen and i looked out my blinds and saw a triangle it hoovered there then it shot off them reaper  in the sky i noticed that it wold leave after a air craft i believe was us air force. soon enough i noticed that the plane was chastening it. then i saw it make a turn form strait to side ways almost over my pleas. as you can tell i was shocked and fascinated. the way i lost sight of the object is it went form strait to up strait in sec.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Zooming across the sky realy bright

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard when i suddenly saw a bright red light in the sky. it moved swiftly,quickly, and silently, then came to a stop. it didn't look like any aircraft that i had seen. i got out my phone to record it. after a minute or two, i went to get a camcorder but when i came back it was gone.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky, moved unlike a conventional craft, silently

content.detailedDescription:
there is and has been orbs in the sky over covington since at least september 1st of last year. friday night i was playing video games when i suddenly felt fear come over me and i felt that i should go look out side to see if the orbs were visible and they were. one in particular stood out from the rest it seemed as though i was tiring to get my attention. it was moving up and down and then in in circles and then left to right and then it would just start to wonder away but the abruptly move back to its position. this orb was showing similar mannerisms as other orbs i have observer in the past and what seems to be a recurring theme is that while some orbs  positioned in and around the area above the city do not move much they all flicker  red and white light but the one that is active is actually gradually moving across the sky at a very slow rate of speed i would not able to guess the rate of speed accurately but if i had to guess i would say less than 1000 ft per hr.!
  
  i called up a friend of mine that lives close by to see if he could verify the orb however he was on his way to work and told me that he saw channel 12 news vans on winston ave. because of a car accident. so i decided that since the accident was only about 2 blocks away that they might want to check out the orb (actually this orb and the others were probably visible from where the news vans were located and all they would of had to do is look up!) 
 
  so i called the 12 "action" hotline and a lady answered the phone and i asked her if there was a news crew on winston ave. and she said yes and so i asked if the thought they might be interested in filming a ufo? and as soon as i said that the orb i was watching shot straight up like a flash and this lady's attitude changed and she told me that "we" are only interested in "serious" news and hung up on me. i got the impression that she and at least 12 news personnel are told to dismiss any information regarding ufos!,and that she could not talk to me any further or risk getting in some sort of trouble. however as soon as the call was over the orb came back. it dropped down past the clouds by fort right and gradually worked its way back into its flightpath.
content.summary: Covington

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk at midnight with a friend, when i noticed a yellow object,moving in multiple directions, making manuevers that no present aircraft or satellite could do. after my friend went back inside,i decided to look further into this, it was then i discovered there was not just one, but about 20-25 of these. one of the larger ones was yellow and the other one was blue, and each had what looked like its own fleet,that is,if color is an indication of their races,several sped up and i saw a flash of light as they moved,and then they disappeared,this was the smaller ones, the two main ones didn't move much,i never believed in aliens until last night.
content.summary: Taking a walk at midnight with a friend

content.detailedDescription: On this night, three young women sat in bed staring out the window. after a few miniuts of looking, two of the three look away. but just as they are doing so the one girl still looking sees a blue light, about the size of the stars above. she said it appered about 60 feet away from the window. she then made the other girls look up and watch, but only one kept looking with her. as the two girls watched, they once again saw the light. it was electric blue, with a shimmer. it stayed about 10 seconds befor it disared again, it had this same pattern each time. is really freeked out all of the girls. shortly after that, they were still watching, and the dot appered again, except this time, is streched into a beam of blue light. the girls became very scared, slamed the window. after the quite paniking, got back in the bed, turned off the light again, their was a growl. it was similar to a cat crossed with a dog, but it was dark, maleviolent, and sinister. it was quick and fast, bt extreemly scarie. it was almost like it was in the room with us, but it sounded almost like it was coming from the window.
content.summary: Series of small blue dots appearing in different places at different times.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband walked outside on front porch yelled for me to get my camera .
3 red orbs in sky big triangle . they changed their shape into a straight line a fourth red orb appeared , they split up moving around each other .
one stood still , the other 3 went back into a triangle formation . 
as i started to take a picture with my digital camera the triangle stoped 
moving.One orb grew bigger pulsing red and then my camera just powered off.
tried to turn it back on and it would not do anything.We watched as the triangle looked as if it wasn't going up but down till we couldn't see it .
the fourth orb that was not in triangle flashed and zipped at very very high speed across the sky and was gone.
content.summary: Decatur

content.detailedDescription: Was walking along a power line walking trail in horsham pa circa 2-2.30am april 3rd 2011 (almost a week after nearby willow grove naval air station transferred all aircraft elsewhere due to closure, so there should be no aircraft flying that low nearby here). i stopped on the trail because a house's outside lights kept flicking on and off and i thought someone might have been messing around but after walking away and watching from distance after a fifteen minute walk away they were still flicking off and on, so i figured it must have been electronic malfunction. the lights were not dimmed like a dying bulb would look like. so i return to the trail where this home is located very nearby and i notice in the sky four bright, yellow lights flying extremely low over a corn field/patch of woods. lights were located, from this vantage point, one on each wing tip. if you were to divide the wingspan from tip to tip into three equal sections, the other two lights would be at the points where the middle section meets the two outer divisions. flying i believe to be around half a mile, at the most, in the air, coming from south east going north west i was basically looking straight at its head/nose section at the point. i initially thought it was hovering over the field but subsequently came to realize it was just moving very slowly. at the altitude it was flying i believe a car could easily outdistance it driving at forty miles/hour. i quickly grabbed a pair of 16x binoculars and by then, noticed the craft appeared to be gaining altitude and possibly speed, as well. it flew directly overhead of me and that is when i began to hear the propulsion. it was low, rumbling but not loud enough to wake the residents of the community it passed over. note: sound was only audible as it flew overhead. right overhead i noticed what appeared to be an obtuse triangular shape, with the obtuse angle being the nose. although i don't believe it was truly a triangle because the back end seemed to be bent inward toward the nose, similar to the f-117 - chevron shaped almost. again it was dark out and i could have mistaken it. i noticed that rather than four lights there were six that i can definitely remember. once it was overhead i saw that the wing tips had two yellow lights where the diagonal would meet the obtuse angle. there was a blinking red light underneath, in the center of craft that turned on and off about every second or two. also there were definitely what appeared to be masses of something on either side of the red light under the 'wings'. they reminded me of those detachable bombs from wwii movies, but again i could not confirm what they were. it flew off at a higher altitude and was eventually barred from view by trees. all the while and subsequently the lights of this house were still flickering. i'd also like to note this is the second encounter with this same craft at the same location within a week, all details the same. the initial encounter happened on march 28th 2011 before midnight, i believe between 11pm and midnight. i'll be out there with a camera to document as it seems this is a fairly frequent travel route. i have included a very rough drawing of the craft made in ms paint with a view from straight ahead and one from underneath.
content.summary: Low altitude barely audible bright solid yellow red pulsating lights chevron/triangle craft

peque������a hoja de arbol que ca������a desde arriba me parecio muy extra������o ya que no hay arboles y menos a esa altura pero esa fue mi primera impresi������n,eso me hizo levantarme de la cama y acercarme a la ventana para observar mejor y saber que era, poco a poco iba bajando mas y acercandose a mi ventana hasta llegar a la altura de mi casa y como a unos 20 metros de distancia fue algo impresionante era una nave como en forma de caparazon de tortuga por la parte de arriba y plana abajo en color gris parecido al oxford sin brillo pero tampoco opaca algo especial no se com describirlo de mejor forma, se mov������a como una hoja de arbol callendo sin que hubise aire sobre su propio eje de izquierda a derecha y eso me hizo poder ver primero la parte alta de la nave y despues del otro noche sin mucho resplandor, hac������a un ruido raro, mi hija que ten������a 24 a������os en esa fecha estaba en la sala con una amiga de su misma edad, ella nunca hab������a cre������do en esta clase de cosas, le grite para que viniera a ver lo que yo esta viendo y se a llevado la sorpresa de su vida llego posteriormente su amiga a la recamara y coment������ que es ese ruido tan raro la hice que se asomara y v������o la nave antes descrita,nos quedamos mudas despu������s de unos minutos esta nave comenzo a avanzar en forma linean meciendose como les comente en su propio eje de un lado a otro, sin que la perdieramos de vista durante mucho tiempo, nunca se me ocurrio sacar mi celular para tomar fotos quede impactada con una sensaci������n de escalofrio constante, confundida,emocionada, rara y a su vez de igual forma mi hija y su amiga, debo decir que desde d������a tengo la seguridad de que existen, no se que es pero es algo desconocido para mucha gente, a la semana siguiente fu������ la salida de la escuela de mi hijo y me invitaron a su festival, estabamos todos los padres de familia de los ni������os que saldr������a de ese ciclo escolar cuando en el cielo vimos varios padres y ni������os una figura plateada o blanca brillosa era como un astronauta y estuvo ah������ por mucho tiempo aproximadamente 30 minutos de hechos var������as personas gravaron ������sto y poco a poco se fu������ alejando hasta ya no verlo. esa fue mi experiencia, me gustar������a poder saber si alguien a visto lo que yo, he buscado en internet sin tener ������xito para comparar la nave vista por mi y la de otros pero no encuentro nada parecido.
content.summary: Como un caparazon de tortuga

content.detailedDescription: I was outside our apartment enjoying a cigarette at night with my girlfriend. she and i often look at the sky for objects. she noticed a spherical object flying fairly high in the sky. we both looked for strobe light which will often signify a plane at night. the object moved into our field of vision and i sent her inside to get her phone to take a picture. the photo did not come out, but we did see a plane about 2 or 3 minutes later about the same altitude with strobe lights. it gave us an estimate to how fast the other object was moving, which was considerably faster between parts of the big dipper. the object disappeared by continuing its flight in the same direction. the object did not move in any lateral fashion. i did not really feel anything, as i do believe in alien life. i would add it was kind of exciting to watch.
content.summary: Looking up an noticed object zipping across sky at night without red blue strobes.

content.detailedDescription:
Where were you and what were you doing at the time?
in the fall of 2009, i had been living with my family in the north pakistan city of lahore for four months as my father, whose a provincial bureaucrat from the sindh province of pakistan, was sent by the sindh government there for some professional training. he completed his training on january 10, 2010 which was the date we set off for our home province and its capital karachi. we travelled by highway and i used my sony handycam dcr-hc96e to record the passing scenery from the window of my car. i was using the memory card mode of the camera to make it easier to upload the pictures and video to my computer instead of the minidv tape mode. it took us four days to reach karachi. on the way, we stayed in the cities of multan, rahim yar khan and sukkur.

what made you first notice the object?
we were somewhere on the highway between the cities of multan and ryk, more closer to the latter, when i saw the phenomenon while recording the local scenery. i recorded the phenomenon for as long as it was visible. i also took a picture of it.

what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
when i was recording it i thought it was probably the afterburn of a missile or air force jet. i could not identify or see any vehicle at the other end of this streak of fire. i even took a picture of the phenomenon but still couldn't identify the source. i was also intrigued by the absence of any missile test announcements by the pakistan govt and military. 

describe the object and its actions and motions.
it seemed to be the fire trail or afterburn of a missile or a jet. it was quite far yet clearly visible in the sky. i could not make out any visible source of it. 

how did you lose sight of the object?
it simply disappeared.

i would like to reiterate that i have a video recording of the phenomenon as well as a picture. if approached by your representative, i would gladly share both.
content.summary: Probable ufo over northern pakistan

content.detailedDescription: As i was on my way home from califonia between feb. and april of 2000, i came upon a ufo sitting north of interstate 40. it was about 10 miles east of petrified forest, az. i slowed down and took a good look at it. it was oval and had a light on top and on bottom of the craft. it also had a row of lights horizontally in the middle of the craft. the lights were strobing very fast. i slowed down but then got scared and i stepped on the gas. there was a very bright light shining away from me to the north. and i could see the top of the plains which was pretty far from the interstate. as i sped off i passed a trucker heading westward and i flashed him to warn him. i went over a hill and i saw his brake lights come on for a couple seconds. i wish i would've stopped and went back. i never reported it. it was by a exit called pinta road, which is in a desolate area. i only lived about 30 minutes from that area at the time but i never went back that morning.
content.summary: Ufo north of i-40

content.detailedDescription:
I run *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) a paranormal blog, and i took a trip to sedona, az last week for fun and to see if i could capture anything on film for my blog.  i had been told by locals that things often show up on camera near the "vortexes" that don't show up to the naked eye.  
as my parents and i hiked up bell rock, i took several pictures of the sky and carefully scanned first to make sure i wasn't photographing any planes, hawks or helicopters.  the sky was totally clear to my eye when i took this.  upon reviewing my photos last night, i found several anomalies only in the skies of sedona photos, but this was the strangest one.  it appears to be disc-shaped, grayish or silver, with some kind of white vertical cylinder in the center.

i have attached the un-edited, full-size original photo, as well as a close-up of just the object.  to find the ufo in the full-size, look at the center of the sky area, then slightly up and slightly left.
content.summary: Ufo over bell rock sedona, az, only on camera

content.detailedDescription: Trained observer, professional, was performing my duties on siue school campus, when for some unknown reason i looked up and observed a green in color sphere traveling east to west in a fast straight line, it had a soft green glow and was faster than aircraft i have seen in this area, no aviation lights were seen and as fast as was going it made no sound, no meteor tail was seen, just a green glowing orb. when it finished crossing the campus it disappeared, just went off, like a light bulb, just winked off and never seen it again the remainder of the night. end of report. sc
content.summary: Green sphere traveling east to west over city

content.detailedDescription:
I was at ross hills park playing disc golf and football with friends, and i was watching the sunset too because i thought it was pretty with all the jet vapor trails streaking the golden sky. also, it was so quiet that you could hear the jet engines making muffled sonic booms in the distance. but then i saw something i've never seen before. (it should be noted that this area is somewhat close to an airport so jets are very common.)

there was a shiny object in the western sky, about the same altitude as the jets, and i wondered what it was. at first i thought, "oh, it's just a plane without a vapor trail. but it wasn't making a sound, and i couldn't see a tip or a tail and it was thicker. it almost seemed to be turning and giving off its own light, but i just kept watching and stopped what i was doing.
the object was moving at a modest pace, and the glare of the sunset made it very visible. 

i didn't think too much of the object until it accelerated inexplicably. not only did it accelerate across the sky, but it seemed to move away from the earth; either that, or it just became decreasingly opaque with the increase in speed. either way, it vanished very smoothly. i have seen jets and shooting stars during the day and night, and this was neither.
content.summary: Shiny disc illuminated by a sunset glare

content.detailedDescription:
When i reviewed the photos from my friends camera on facebook today there was this object in the sky, there was nothing in the sky that day, maybe birds, but this object doesn't seem to be any kind of bird. it may be water on the lens but a picture right after this one lacks any kind of distortion.

unexplainable flying object indeed.
content.summary: Strange object showed up in photo [photo]

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from taking boyfriend to the er and pulled in the driveway, when i happen to notice this round light going in a circle over the neighbors back yard. my first thought was a spotlight, however the more i looked at it, the light was a very small circle compared to that of the normal track of spotlight and also there was no light trail going to it. it was extremely quite outside, i had thought maybe someone is outside with some sort of light or something but again no trail going to it. there was not a sound outside so no way it could have been a plane or helicopter that didn't even cross my mind. i continued to stare at this because i couldn't figure out what i was seeing. i then realized that light was not going up but coming down from the sky. the reason i say this is because there was thick cloud cover and i happened to noticed the clouds were in front of this light. i thought about running in and grabbing camera cause i wanted to be able to show my boyfriend but i never made it inside as i just stood there staring at it trying to figure out what it was. after i few more minutes i went inside. this whole process was approximately 5-10 minutes long. i am unsure of what i seen but no matter what i can seem to figure out any logical explanation and seeing that the light was coming down and the clouds were going in front of it kind of knocks out anything i had thought of to try and explain what this was.
content.summary: Choose a digital video camera

content.detailedDescription: My family and i was driving home to ellettsville, indiana from indianapolis, indiana after a ultrasound appointment and a day of shopping and dinner! it was around 9pm and i am tired and feet are aching, my husband is eager to get home as well cause he as a head cold and wanted to watch the basketball game! we are on highway 37 going south between indianapolis and moorseville when my husband looks out the front window of my minivan right above the dash and yells "what is that"? i look and was shocked i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i am surprised i didn't crash. i saw a very large triangle shaped with rounded corners flying very low between the two highways of 37. it looked like it was flying straight and slow with no side to side or up and down motion but only got to see it for a minute if that cause it was flying north and i was driving south at 60 mph. my husband and children said they saw what i saw but my husband noticed it cause he was in the passenger said and noticed the flashing light hovering very low! there was a large also rounded trianglar shaped light under it that was very bright and flashing. i looked in my rear view mirror and could see it flashing going over cars and headed to indianapolis! i wanted to turn around and follow it but my husband wouldn't let me! we was all just in shock i think just stunned about what we just saw and confused but knew there was no way that was a flying craft from our world.I thought about it all night was just surprised that it was very quiet and very low to the ground. i would never had seen it if my husband hadn't said something! i am sure others had to see it as well there was lots of traffic but it was very dark and most people might of just thought it was some kind of airplane but i have never seen an airplane fly that low or be that quiet or that large! i thought in the past a few times that i saw a ufo from a distance but this one was up close and personal so i know for sure now i am not crazy and others are not crazy that there is other kinds out there!  i really wished we could of gotten a photo or video of it but it will for sure be in our minds forever!
content.summary: Large rounded trianglar shape with flashing lights flying low between highway 37 in indiana

content.detailedDescription: So saw more orange lights again, not going to make a detailed report. been seeing these lights here for 2 years now and not 1 single mufon person has taken the time to come out here. we see them for days at a time. probably see them again sunday night. not planes, not venus, not a weather balloon.
content.summary: More orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was looking for ufos (as usual in my backyard), it was about 10:00 p.M. i looked  46 degress west and a bright white object with a strick about 30 to 60 ft long.At first i thought it was a shooting star.Its actions were staight west no moving around just straight. it looked liked it was about to crash. after it disappeared 4 to 7 seconds later i heard sirens go off ,and they where going for about 5 min. after that i wrote every thing that happened that past 10 mins in my note book. the ufo encounter was a ce 1 i flet nothing i didnt do any thing i just stood there i lost sight of it when it went behind the trees. after that i wrote it all down in my note book. the sighting was a ce 1, and thats my story.
content.summary: Very fast not that long
